profile:
I am a full stack developer working with Panasonic to develop web applications that employ machine learning for usage internally within Panasonic.

Despite majoring in Chemical Engineering in NUS for my undergraduate degree, I rapidly advanced my knowledge and skills in web development in the year of 2020 as I have always had a passion for coding. Within 6 months of development, I was hired as a full stack developer with Panasonic.

In my current role, my main role is to work with machine learning/AI engineers to create web applications which are accessible to internal users.

Concurrently , I am also a financial consultant of 5 years with AIA Singapore.

My responsibilities in this role mainly comprises of providing sound financial advice to clients and assisting them to purchase optimal insurance and investment products which aligns with their life plans.

qualifications.name:
M9 & M9A
Life Insurance
and Investment-Linked Policies

financialConsultant.details:
Rising Star Award 2015

fullStackDeveloper.details:
Play a vital role in developing computer vision web apps

Worked with machine learning engineers to bring the app from backend to frontend

infoTechIntern.details:
Self taught in AngularJS/ HTML / CSS / JavaScript

Developed and deployed an internal web app for the company within 1.5 months

Took charge of trainings and marketing initiatives to promote adoptation of new technologies within the company

platoonCommander.details:
Underwent rigorous training to be commissioned as a platoon commander for wartime and peacetime missions

Led a team of 20 soldiers to support security forces in various high-key events such as the IISS Shangri-la Dialogue 2013 and National Day Parade 2013
